NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​Avalonia.​Interfaces.​IUserRespondedToUpdateCheck
public interface
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​Avalonia.​Interfaces.​IUserRespondedToUpdateCheck
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​Avalonia.​UpdateAvailableWindow

Interface that allows one object to tell another that the user has responded to an update check with a given response. Used by the UpdateAvailableWindow's view model.

Functions
UserRespondedToUpdateCheck
void UserRespondedToUpdateCheck(
UpdateAvailableResult response
)

The user responded to a given update check with some sort of response (e.g. skip update, install update)

Parameter
response
UpdateAvailableResult

The user's response to the update notification
